title: Discovery Travel And Living - The Richies Tvrip
description:
The richies

Where would fantasize about being rich, what would we do, how we would spend the money, where would travel. In this program aired on Discovery Travel and Living is possible to know the lifestyle of a few millionaires, how they accumulate Forturia and where they like to spend, what their hobbies.

This program shows 32 billionaires who made this dream a reality. Some did so spectacularly that his fortune was of millions to billions. Who are they? How did they come? Meet the luxurious lifestyle of those people around the world. Discover what money means to them, how they use it to help others and how they feel to be able to satisfy all your desires. Learn what they think these people inside and see how you live the life that the rest of us can only dream of.

A very interesting series, to envy.
